bill.title: Adoption; Records; Proceedings; Contact Preference
bill.description: Allows a natural parent to insert a contact preference, indicating whether the natural parent accepts or declines personal contact with the adopted individual, into the sealed adoption records; clarifies procedures for requesting inspections of adoption records and maintaining confidentiality of parties to an adoption; requires the family court to provide adopted individual with a copy of the natural parent's contact preference; defines contact preference. Effective 07/01/2050. (SD2)
